body:
Create an additional `hdf5` smoke test, per becker33 in https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/17360#pullrequestreview-450292260, that performs the following:

- Use well-structured `hdf5` file
- Check output of `h5dump` on the file
- Use `h5copy` to copy the file
- Ensure `h5diff` of file and copy are identical
title: integrated hdf5 smoke test
